page.title: 19Traffic in Banbury cont'd.
page.content: We have quite a few lorries around coming through Banbury with different products such as cars, coal, different sorts of food and livestock.A lot of lorries come through the centre of Banbury because there are a lot of factories and shops here and because there are no roads going round Banbury. A new link road has just been made from Southam Road to Grimsbury and there are plans for a motorway to bypass Banbury but these have been held up because some people didn't want the countryside to be spoiled by a motorway. There are some taxis in Banbury but not many. There are quite a few garages around. The only other form of travel through Banbury is by boat on the canal. There is a lock near Spiceball.
